attributes.action: Introduce a temporary short-time working scheme to financially support people who have had their incomes reduced following cuts to working hours as a result of severe current economic conditions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many employers are currently deciding whether to cut working hours (retaining employees) or simply lose employees altogether.  When skilled employees are lost the company is unable to take advantage of a subsequent upturn in the economy and some skills may be permanently lost to the country.  Other EU countries (e.g. Germany) support employees on short-time working for periods of up to 18 months.  Our Government should do the same for us.
